website_summaries.verdict: Moves a complete 360° and is adaptable to most climates in terms of function and fit.
pros: Not only maintains the structure of a variety of smartphones and small tablets but cases as well
Sleek in terms of design as well as fit
Works well on different types of material
cons: Nearly perfect in terms of its performance, however it may seem too small for some to   trust with their expensive phones

customer_reviews.title: Great for between-dash panel installation
customer_reviews.text: Quick video review. I like this mount a lot and I’m using it in a novel way with an XsMax. Six magnets in a small mount = a lot of hold force. Also you can still use inductive charging with positioning of the steel plate at the lowest point of the Xs Max.
customer_reviews.author: AaronR

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnetic Phone Clip.
customer_reviews.text: Many of the magnetic clips sold on Amazon have rather small and round adhesive attachments which can be a problem with them staying attached. Which is why I chose this particular product, as it has a rectangular adhesive strip which is more then double what I saw on other products, and the clip itself is also light yet made of a rigid metal. I waited a few months before reviewing as I wanted to see if the adhesive would indeed stay adhered to my dash. No issues, and it continues to work great for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: WaywardSand

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend. Will Review again if issues arise.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty magnet. Much better than one I previously purchased where my phone would drop off over road bumps. Not the case with this well made product. Would recommend fully. Time will tell if the adhesion works but I did prep the dash board area with rubbing alcohol to take off any finger print oils or detailing spray that may have been on the surface first. Would recommend for that clean look because it's not bulky or splashed with a big ugly logo. Very understated.
customer_reviews.author: SubieNewbie

customer_reviews.title: ... first on my phone case alone because it is pretty thick. It held very well
customer_reviews.text: I tested the car mount with the magnet plate first on my phone case alone because it is pretty thick. It held very well. I did not want to struggle with having to take my phone case off every time I used the holder in my car. I also did not want to put the magnet ON my case because it would hide my case. I have a “Case Yard” phone case. I didn’t even realize it or read the box but it works perfect as a kickstand. 👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Rosy Posy

customer_reviews.title: It works like advertised and strong
customer_reviews.text: I got mine just the other day and my first impression was a surprize at how strong the magnet is. This comes with 3M double sided tape pads to mount the holder frame to your desired mounting area and another to mount to the back of your phone. Real handy with no clips or clamps to worry about especially if driving and only having one hand free to mount or unmount your phone. Very simple yet effective idea.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good inconspicuous cell phone holder. The magnet is strong and keeps my phone in place. I have a s7 edge and didn't even have to put a magnet sticker on my phone. It connects to the metal under the glass in the middle of the back. Quality control could be a little better. It looks like it was molded a little uneven around the sides and the ball that rotates it was a little scuffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Magnet was too weak
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about trying a magnetic phone holder for my car but this was definitely not a good product for me. I attempted to use this product with my IPhone 7plus in a Mophie Case. The magnet was not strong enough to prevent it from sliding off. If you have a heavier case this is not the mount for you.
customer_reviews.author: shneequa

customer_reviews.title: the BEST"!! Cell Phone, mp3 holder!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the BEST", & amazing cell phone, mp3 player mount i believe" available. Its small, doesn't take up space on your dash, or windshield. The magnet it super strong, as well adhesive that mounts the holder. Make sure you have it straight the first time, because one you place it, its THERE! The good thing about is you cant go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Strong little guy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a custom mount for a custom motorcycle solution. While I do not intend to mount a phone to this , the strength of the magnet is amazing. The design is unique and worked out really well for me. I ended up making the cable spot slightly larger but apart from that great product.
customer_reviews.author: Aseem Patnaik

customer_reviews.title: Works as described not blocking refrigeration air flow.
customer_reviews.text: So far, this phone holder has worked was described. The only down side is that the color has changed from dark black to a reddish brown. I assume, from Phoenix car passenger compartment heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic is the way these should all be made.
customer_reviews.text: Magnetic is the way to go in the car. I didn't realize that the face of this would turn too so it's handy if you want to rotate the phone between portrait and landscape modes, it has a soft "click" at each 45 degree rotation. The only slight annoyance to me is that the logo isn't perfectly aligned with the rotations, and it's actually sort of garish anyway. All black would have been preferable. As for convenience though, top marks; slap the phone on, grab it off without fooling around with clips.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: super sturdy, one of the better mounts I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have had many different magnetic mounts that I typically use in my vehicle. I started replacing the ones I had with this one because i have a big and heavy phone, and this mount can hold it with no problems. The others would sag or droop down, or tilt down on their own because of the weight. Definitely recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Re: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient magnet holder. I like that I don't need to obstruct the CD player or air vent. I had to bend the metal base to get my phone to an angle I liked. But you most likely need to do this depending on the layout and shape of your dashboard.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle M Siu

customer_reviews.title: Best phone mount for cars
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been amazing in my car! It was the FIFTH product I tried and the ONLY one that actually works. I live in NC and the summers are brutally hot, especially inside a car. All the other products I tried either broke because they were plastic or wouldn't stick. I didn't even get a chance to mount this properly and more than a year later it's still holding strong and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: True Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: My original review was seen within a couple of days and I received an email offering several solutions; in which I elected to give the product another try. I told them that if their product worked this time I would willingly update my review. It works great now and I also received a follow up email to check on delivery and function. Customer service is definitely 5 stars. I installed this and on the first turn I took this product and my phone went flying across my truck. I couldn’t get it to stick after that. It was really inconvenient. I wouldn’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, small, strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice looking phone mount- small but with a very strong magnetic. I would have liked to make it work. However, I had to return it cause it didn’t fit in the place I needed it to on my car. I have an older car and it just wasn’t going to work for my needs. Looking at all the customer review pix I never saw a dash close to mine so I probably should have taken that into account.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for my cell phone
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would support my phone over the ledge of my dash - I bought one and it didn’t stand tall enough nor did it hang over enough to be able to hold my phone. I saw this one I just received it I have checked on how and where to see if it will work and it looks like it will work, it is also a very sturdy well made phone stand, very happy I bought it.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3m tape sucks!!
customer_reviews.text: It will not stick to anything in my car! I mounted it where I wanted it that night I got it and got in my car to go to work the next morning and it was on my floor board and the 3m tape was not sticky anymore. The item is made very well but the crappy choice to use a thin 3M tape that doesn't stay sticky is a bad choice.
customer_reviews.author: HarryKaincles

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Sticks to my dash, even through high heat. Magnet is strong enough to keep my phone in place, but not strong enough that I have to worry about ripping the mount off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sturdy. The adhesive really holds on
customer_reviews.text: Well built and sturdy. The adhesive really holds on. The magnet is strong enough to hold my Pixel XL with a case while the metal square is in-between.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hold
customer_reviews.text: very nice tiny holder good for the price and don't spoil my phone i didn't use the other magnet on phone case as i have i phone x it directly hold and don't fall off during driving.
customer_reviews.author: Saikumar

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive won't stay secured in 80 degree weather or higher
customer_reviews.text: So my wife had previously had a Vava adhesive mount for her car, which lasted about 6 months before falling off. This car mount had almost 5 stars and a lot of good reviews. This is the 2nd time it's fell since I put it on, in the same location as the previous one, in the first week of having it on. And it's only been in the 80s so far, which means it's going to do worse when summer actually gets here.
customer_reviews.author: Cking21

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device after researching many other models. This works much better than others I have used in the past
customer_reviews.author: wopstopusa

customer_reviews.title: bought  3 all work great
customer_reviews.text: great little product and the price is great too....follow the directions and do NOT use holder for 24hrs after its stuck, i assume this is to allow the sticky tape glue to set. I tried it right after and it worked for a bit then fell off. This is when i actually read the directions and found my mistake. They supply extra tape and and metal plates so i just fixed my mistake and was good to go. Then i bought 2 more followed directions and its been a couple months with no issue for the first one while the next 2 have been about a week no issue.
customer_reviews.author: drynick

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet! Compact size!
customer_reviews.text: Compact size makes it hardly noticeable on the dash. Strong magnet. I have a galaxy note 9 and it has never fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mount!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a car mount that works for me, I need a mount that allowed me to see my, and not block everything. I also needed one that wasn’t bulky. This mount is perfect and strong made out of medal, not pastic.
customer_reviews.author: Frederika

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: As long as your case is thin the metal piece works great when installed inside the case. Otherwise it needs to be outside the case. It sticks great though. Doesn't fall off when you hit a speed bump.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Overn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and everything works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product itself because it is more quality than just an average cell phone holder. What really impressed me was the instructions included and all the materials you need including alcohol pads. It is very easy to install and works well!
customer_reviews.author: Kasim Chaudhry

customer_reviews.title: really works where I needed it to
customer_reviews.text: I drive alot and I like easy. mounting this and using it is just that easy. great adhesive good styling and versatile magnetic head that's easy to position. couldn't ask for a better mount.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: Small and Discreet
customer_reviews.text: Small sturdy unit, strong magnet holds my I-Phone 11 in place. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Freeze Frame

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept, poorly executed.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking phone mount but part of the reason why I bought it was because there was a nice hole where you could feed the charging cable through. Turns out that the hole is completely useless because you can’t fit any charger through it. I had to drill a larger hole to accommodate even the smallest charger cable. All in all, I would recommend that you spend less for another magnet mount cause there is nothing special about this one.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: TINY! Actual dimensions are FAR smaller....
customer_reviews.text: Opened this and literally laughed. It's TINY. Dimensions are nowhere near as stated in listing. I don't know if there is a larger size and they mistakenly sent me the smaller one, or....? I have another mount in my second vehicle and the magnetic head holds my phone over rough terrain with no issues. I held this in my hand and stuck my phone to it to check magnet strength...one tiny movement and the phone fell right off. Now I have to deal with returning this thing...ugh. Are all these positive reviews fake??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: It definitely adheres to the dash. The only downside is the angled piece is not very flexible and I don’t know if it will break if I try to bend it. The magnetic piece works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne D

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive issue
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install, however a couple days after I started using this magnet on the back of my phone started sliding. The magnet would stay stuck on the vent magnet, but my phone would slide down while I drove. The magnets are strong but the adhesive on the back for the phone magnet needs much improvement. I had to stop using this after my phone slid off of the magnet entirely. I used this product with an iPhone 7 Plus. This might work better on a lighter weight phone.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Overall the magent mount is definitely stronger then other brands I've tried before. I'm currently using a pixel 4a with a large plate mounted between the phone and case. I've had a few instances where highway gaps cause my phone to slip down which makes readjustment necessary. I'm going to try a different texture for a case to see if that resolves the issues I'm having.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: Dry alcohol pads and it won't stick to my dashboard
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this product is great. However, the alcohol pads were completely dry. I used my own cleaner to clean the dashboard followed the directions and it wouldn't stick to my dashboard for anyting. I'm going to try to find some glue or other adhesive to stick it on there with.
customer_reviews.author: Tsalagi Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Came Unstuck
customer_reviews.text: You need an absolutely flat surface for this pad to stick right. Any type of curvature underneath your sticky pad will not withstand the daily use of pulling your phone off off the magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Strong double-sided tape and robust construction
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mount I have found so far. The adhesion qualities of the double-sided tape is strongest I have ever seen, and I don’t have any worries that the metal bracket will eventually snap like the plastic ones I have used in the past. Good job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good dash mount, not a distraction on the dash
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to not be a distraction on the dash and adequate for holding a iphone8. Bought one originally for my wife’s car months ago and it did a decent job on a trip. The pictured one is the second purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brownie

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok as long as you dont ever want to move it
customer_reviews.text: It is attached with adhesive, make sure you like it where it is. The magnet is mounted on an angled bracket, the angle is not adjustable and may not fit the way you like. I used a piece of duct-tape to temporarily mount it to make sure it fit like I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S

customer_reviews.title: BEST 10000+ STARS!  Thank you for Inventing this one cuz its perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Okay seriously I couldn't love these more if I tried!!!! I LOVE IT! It is the BEST way to have your phone where you can glance at it while still keeping your eyes on the road! Bought this for just about everyone this Christmas and EVERYone loves them!!!! I'd give it more stars if I could. GREAT job by the inventor of this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lorri King

customer_reviews.title: Super glue, Super strong, Looks crisp
customer_reviews.text: I love this for its crisp look. Got so many compliments as it merges with my Audi A4's interior. I can also use my flip phone without removing the cover. How nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Setu Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat it for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Holds my iPhone 8 in place at eye level without interfering with my dashboard. Currently using it on a VW and dashboard space is at a premium but it just fits between windshield and dashboard. Magnet is on back of my case as I felt weird about it being directly place on phone. Holds great. some slight slippage if I'm going over heavily rutted dirt roads but never came off completely .
customer_reviews.author: Jacob's Mom

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This was my third and last phone holder. I wanted something that would fit close to the dash and be sturdy. this fits the bill. and holds the vent tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: very helpful tool , it stick on my car very well an d i can use it for my phone when it navigationing ,pretty aweome stuff
customer_reviews.author: liam

customer_reviews.title: Good magnetic mount!
customer_reviews.text: Great simple magnetic phone mount. Does exactly what it's supposed to and looks good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Collin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a couple months now and I love it. The magnet works very well. It's string enough that my phone doesn't fall off, but not so strong that the phone is difficult to remove
customer_reviews.author: Kalilah Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Not the best option if you want your phone to stay put
customer_reviews.text: My phone falls off of it super easily and I even added extra magnets to the back of my phone to help make it even sturdier but it's the mount itself that doesn't have a strong magnet. Actually needing to purchase a new mount since my phone is too easily knocked off.
customer_reviews.author: Dynae

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I travel with my job and to have my phone available is a must and this was just exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: kshaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice low profile Magnetic Phone Holder
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the magnet surface could be slightly larger for a more secure contact.
customer_reviews.author: jdburns35

customer_reviews.title: Good product, even better service
customer_reviews.text: I got the product and faced some problems with the installation and after reaching out to the company email, got a new product in no time. Also the company representative constantly kept track of the product and it’s working through emails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great phone holder
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is very strong and the phone does not slide of, in addition the tape sticks and holds the holder in place even in the hot Texas sun.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Kelsoe

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: It comes with alcoholic pads to clean the surface before and after you attach it to the dashboard. FYI, you do have to place it on a flat surface (no curves) in order for it to stick properly.
customer_reviews.author: AxinJaxin

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the Pop Socket
customer_reviews.text: Really solid little mount. I wanted something that would mount flat on my dash and keep my phone at a 90 degree angle while not being too bulky. It feels really solid (it’s metal) and actually looks good when not in use. It includes multiple different magnetic plates to stick on your phone and even includes a round one that fits perfect on the pop socket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsure How Long it Will Last
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily. It doesn't feel like it can take the stress ongoing. I'm really careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: wendyfromhome

customer_reviews.title: Large logo
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t match the photos - has a logo that cannot be seen from the product photos
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product is what it says, installs easy and has strong magnet. Comes with extra pieces/parts. Been using it all winter. Summer remains to be seen as my truck sits in the desert and get 145 degrees inside, so we'll see how the adhesive holds up. But impressed thus far. I'm going to buy a couple more for other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for several days... Then disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Putting it in place is fine. However after several days of use, I accidentally slapped my hand on it getting the phone off the dash It came right off and the adhesive had no more grip. Going with a windshield mount next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B. Ferrandino

customer_reviews.title: Quality product With a small footprint that allows you to stick it nearly anywhere on your dashboard
customer_reviews.text: Very well made...I’ve typically used the Scosche magic mount on my dash for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: haunted house

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned like stated in instructions and it would not stay attached
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Debiase

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my best friend after buying one for myself
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my best friend after buying one for myself. Love it! It doesn't take up a lot of room, the magnet is strong enough to hold a phone in place without moving around,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to install and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.text: It works very well to hold my phone on the dashboard at an easy to reach place. But I bought it to hold my Garmin DriveSmart 61 LMT-S on that place and that doesn’t work: the adhesive on the plate doesn’t fill the gap for the adapter in the back of the Garmin so it cannot hold the device in place.
customer_reviews.author: Arjen

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive came loose after 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: The holder is sturdy and the magnets are strong. The 3m tape on the holder does great. The adhesive on the round plate you stick on the back of the phone came loosen on the second day. There is lots of residue on the phone so I know it was cleaned properly.
customer_reviews.author: ski4daze

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Highly recommend it. Sticks really well and does not come off easily. bought some for my sons friends too
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: BEST CELL PHONE HOLDER EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product!! Just tuck magnet inside phone case and clip holder to vent. Boom, done. Couldn’t be simpler and way more convenient than clipping phone to holder each time you get in the car. Magnet is strong and holds well. Bought for hubby and ended up ordering two more for my son and I.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have a magnetic finger loop on the back of my phone. I use it in my car, my phone has never fallen off!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: A very good product. I was concerned because my phone is ...
customer_reviews.text: A very good product. I was concerned because my phone is a larger LG and the strength of the magnet holds my phone very well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Rabbat

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can toss my phone on the magnet ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can toss my phone on the magnet and it doesn't move and I don't lose it in my car. I bought 3, 2 went in the vent no problem, 1 we have had to play with a bit to get it to stay. Still love it
customer_reviews.author: Lorie McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been a uber driver two months use this everyday, very solid piece.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This mount cannot hold large smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has iPhone 6s plus. This mount cannot hold the iPhone. The magnetic area was too small to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little holder. I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 8 and it holds my phone great. I was hesitant about the stickiness to my Honda dashboard, but I've had no issues. I even bought my dad one because he was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I slipped the magnetic strips behind my cell phone case. I didn't even have to stick them on my actual phone. I have a life proof case. Works perfect! Great value! :)
customer_reviews.author: Meredith S.

customer_reviews.title: Not again
customer_reviews.text: Damn thing fell off after two weeks. I did what the instructions said as well! Tried using different 3m tape nothing will hold this thing. Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Zachary smith

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no sticking power whatsoever.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product that does not work. Absolutely no sticking power whatsoever. Did not even work long enough to test it out, that’s how bad it is. Save your money & go with a better product. Definitely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Small size and working as advertised
customer_reviews.text: installation very easy Magnet strong Adhesion is strong as well
customer_reviews.author: AlGor

customer_reviews.title: nice phone holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made metal phone holder. I attached it to smooth, hard plastic in the car and the metal plate to the back of my phone with no cover, so no problems with adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: cr

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn’t work that great. When you take your phone off the magnetic part comes with it off the vent.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S. Westerfield

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install - Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I installed the mount in minutes, and my phone is extremely stable on the mount. You can turn the phone any direction, since it is just held by a magnet. The mount also comes with several shaped magnets to match what works best for your phone. I loved it so much I bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: Frank the  Fixer

customer_reviews.title: Glue doesn’t stick for long
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback is the glue wears out quickly but can be remedied. Other than that I like this product
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Tape doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: I used the product for about 6 weeks and no longer stuck to the dashboard. It comes with 2 extra 3M strips of tape, but the second application lasted about 3 days. Need to come up with a better solution to keep adhered to the car.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product showed up fast and as promised. Great durability and size. A really good buy in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cullor

customer_reviews.title: Too Weak
customer_reviews.text: Most important is that the magnate is too weak to hold the phone! Other than that it would probably work!
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small, but powerful! Holds my phone perfectly in my car. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica :)

customer_reviews.title: Great Car mount
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far. I use it in my Tesla M3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Opened package and had my cell phone attached to it in minutes. It fits nicely on my air vent, holds the phone very secure and easy to take phone off. Great simple solution for hands free use in the car. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kennedy-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Phone falls sometimes
customer_reviews.text: At times the phone falls on the floor after a while but other than that inconvenience, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Akilah

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy wins for me!
customer_reviews.text: This phone holder is super strong and holds my phone in place while driving. It's absolutely perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cribbs

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product! Holds the phone in place and is easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: AMOL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to uses. Was skeptical because it would be mounted into the ac vent in my bimmer but it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This small but effective cellphone holder was perfect for my car! My vents are small and cross-hatched so many other car mounts for vents won't fit. This cell phone holder stays in place and the magnet for the back of my phone is barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: This one works on Chevy trailblazer
customer_reviews.text: Works on my air vents and as long as you slide the phone off, it will stay in place. Previous brand I purchased did not fit.

product_meta.title: Magnetic Phone Car Mount, Jebsens Universal Magnetic Car Phone Holder Metal Dashboard Cell Phone Stand Compatible with All Smart Phones, Black
feature_bullets: POWERFUL MAGNET FORCE - Upgraded 6 Neodymium Magnets Core provides powerful grip and can easily hold any phone. No worry about phones falling off nor does it change position when go over bumps, potholes or even speed bumps. Safe and convenient for calls, siri, music playing and GPS navigation without looking down away from the roadway!

LARGE 3M VHB TAPE - Jebsens CM05 Magnetic Phone Car Mount has large 3M adhesive (40% larger than similar products) that will stick firmly to any flat surfaces. Stick the phone holder to the dashboard of your car for single-handed operation. The high quality adhesive tape will not leave behind residue when removing. (*Not Recommended to stick on Soft Leather Surface *Flat Surface Works Great **Come with 3 Magnetic Plate & 1 extra 3M VHB adhesive tapes to replace in case you need to move it.)

SMALL AND STRONG - Made of heavy duty metal from the ball to the frame. Not one of those plastic mounts that breaks easily. It blends in with the interior of your car. It does not block your radio, vents, and it does not block your sight lines like the bulky suction cup phone holders. Comes with 12 Months Warranty.

TILTS AND SWIVELS - 360° Rotatable Joint Ball, which makes the car mount holder convenient for you to adjust to your favorite view. You can rotate your smartphone and swivel your display with 360 Degree Rotation for Portrait and Landscape Views.

RICH PACKAGE BUNDLE: comes with 1 x Magnetic Car Mount, 2 x large 4 cm diameter magnets, 1 x extra-large rectangle magnet for your multiple devices, 2 x Protection Films, 1 x Wet Wipes, 1 x Extra 3M VHB tapes!
